product_name: Green Guru Kickstand Cooler Trunk Bag
long_description: Sourced from upcycled materials and stitched together with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Kickstand Cooler Trunk Bag mounts on your rear rack and keeps food insulated while you ride. The Green Guru Kickstand Cooler Trunk Bag is constructed out of upcycled bicycle inner tubes and banners for highly water-resistant performance. Insulated large main compartment stows your gear, groceries and other goodies; can convert into a hip pack or can be used as a shoulder bag off the bike. Internal pocket helps organize your stuff, easy-access exterior pocket offer light stretch. Elastic shock cord; reflective accents. Please note that because this item is made of upcycled materials, each one is unique and specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Sourced from upcycled materials and stitched together with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Kickstand Cooler Trunk Bag mounts on your rear rack and keeps food insulated while you ride.
